snippet.title: BRUTALIST - Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1511790/BRUTALIST

Unreal Engine 5 game from former Lead Level Designer of STALKER 2




BRUTALIST is a third-person meditative game where you need to follow paths, find passages, solve riddles, watch out for radiation and monitor oxygen levels. All this is surrounded by an atmospheric abandoned concrete world.

https://www.instagram.com/denys.rudyi

#unrealengine #UE5 #gamedevelopment #gamedev #realtime #games #nextgen #epicgames #unrealengine5 #brutalist #gaming
